class.name: franka_ros2_teleop/TeleopLeaderController
class.description: The TeleopLeaderController puts the robot in zero-gravity mode so it can be handguided. It also receives the external forces from the follower's state broadcaster and replays them on the robot. This way obstacles encountered by the follower can be 'felt' by the person handguiding the leader.

class.name: franka_ros2_teleop/TeleopFollowerController
class.description: The TeleopFollowerController runs a Joint Impedance Controller that receives its target position from the leader's state brodacaster.
